io.spine.server.commandbus

Class CommandErrorHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.commandbus.CommandErrorHandler

  • @Internal
public final class CommandErrorHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    The handler of the errors thrown while command dispatching.

    The command dispatchers may delegate the error handling to an instance of CommandErrorHandler.

    See Also:
    handleError(CommandEnvelope, RuntimeException)

    • Method Detail

      • with

        public static CommandErrorHandler with(RejectionBus rejectionBus)
        Creates new instance of CommandErrorHandler with the given RejectionBus.
        Parameters:
        rejectionBus - the RejectionBus to post the command rejections into
        Returns:
        a new instance of CommandErrorHandler

      • handleError

        public void handleError(io.spine.core.CommandEnvelope envelope,
                        java.lang.RuntimeException exception)
        Handles an error occurred during dispatching of a command.

        If the given exception has been caused by a command rejection, the Rejection is posted to the RejectionBus. Otherwise, the given exception is thrown.
